jam.io
Class HistogramIO

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--jam.io.HistogramIO
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.FilenameFilter
public class HistogramIO
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.FilenameFilter

Class to read in and write out histograms writes out files in jam histogram format Methods to open files an close files are used by import and export.

Since:
JDK1.1
Version:
0.5 April 98
Author:
Dale Visser and Ken Swartz
See Also:
JamMain

setWriteOptions

public void setWriteOptions(boolean his,
                            boolean gate,
                            boolean scalers)
Sets separately which data writeJHFData should actually output. Not writing histograms when you are saving tape data can significantly save time when you have many 2-d spectra.

Parameters:
his - if true, Histograms will be written
gate - if true, Gates will be written
scalers - if trye, scaler values will be written
